title: "The Power of Symbols: Modifying Perception and Understanding Reality"
first_phrase: In the preceding text, the author discusses a method that helps us understand reality by abandoning discursive concepts based on logical timeframes. This method involves the use of symbols, which allow us to connect with higher principles that transcend time and contingency. In the final 200 tokens, the author makes a comparison between symbols and anchors. While anchors are linear and automatic responses to stimuli, symbols are physical elements that bring different levels of reality together simultaneously. The author emphasizes that the use of symbols is necessary to broaden our vision and connect with our consciousness on a higher level.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the use of symbols is fundamental to connect with a higher reality and to transcend time and space limitations. While the concept of "ancor" is limited and linear, symbols generate a total modification in the operator, activating the mind in a creative and non-automatic way.
